code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const skillsData=[{title:"Architecture & State Management",tags:["Clean Architecture","MVVM","MVC","Bloc","Provider","River-pod"]},{title:"Mobile & Front-End",tags:["Flutter","Dart","Swift","JavaScript","React.js"]},{title:"DevOps & Tools",tags:["CI/CD","Fastlane","Jenkins","GitLab","GitHub","Jira"]},{title:"Databases & APIs",tags:["RESTful APIs","SQLite","Hive","MySQL","Firebase"]},{title:"Leadership & Project Management",tags:["Agile/Scrum","Team Leadership","Mentorship","Stakeholder Management"]}];function Skills(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"skills",className:"mb-16",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold section-title mb-6",children:"Technical Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card p-6 md:p-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",children:skillsData.map((skill,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-semibold text-lg mb-3 text-slate-800",children:skill.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-2",children:skill.tags.map((tag,j)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tag",children:tag},j))})]},i))})})]});}export default Skills;
